title: Jack Daniels Font?

author: anonymous

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415234135im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/8578.jpg)   
No good match   
   
But I have Vector logo if you want to work from.   
when I did a search I notice that you could use some letters from different font set to make a close match
